about_the_game:
This game is still in development, many features aren't currently implemented.

If you find any issues or have suggestions please let me know on Discord

Welcome to Card Dealer!

Step into the exciting world of trading card shops with Card Dealer, where you get to experience the thrill of managing your very own store. Dive into the bustling trading card community, buy and sell cards, build relationships with customers, and watch as your business grows from a small shop to a card empire!

Key Features:

  • Manage Your Own Shop: Take charge of every aspect of your trading card store, from stocking inventory to expanding your store.

  • Hunt for Rare Cards: Seek out elusive and valuable cards to attract collectors and enthusiasts. [NYI]

  • Interact with Customers: Engage with a diverse range of customers, each with unique preferences and personalities. [NYI]

  • Expand Your Business: Participate in tournaments, and become a renowned name in the trading card scene. [NYI]

  • Customize Your Store: Personalize your shop with decorations, layouts, and themes to create a unique experience for your customers.[NYI]

Are you ready to become the ultimate Card Dealer? Start your journey today!

name: Card Dealer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher (64-bit)
  • Processor: 3.20 GHz Six-Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
